text: Peter Beaumont (born 2 January 1965) is a British rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:British male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Great Britain Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Birmingham, West Midlands
title: Peter Beaumont (rower)
